TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_nipaluma-balu_nu_sulda,balo_nu_solda, title = nipaluma-balu_nu_sulda,balo_nu_solda, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/nipaluma-balu_nu_sulda,balo_nu_solda} }

S.FORM: == balu nu sulda, bolo no solda == u siwkay nu nipaluma u sanek nu nipaluma malaheci tu imelang pasubana i cacudadan a lacul u zuma a cidekay a kamu, saungay misapayu' a cidekay u sulit nu zuma a kamu-Hulam atu Amilika

== balo no solda, bolo no solda == o siwkay no nipaloma o sanek no nipaloma malaheci to imelang pasobana i cacodadan a lacol o zoma a cidekay a kamo, saongay misapayo' a cidekay o solit no zoma a kamo-Holam ato Amilika
